abstract: Bomb kills police officer and wounds two civilians in affluent area of Cairo, raising fears that militants are targeting neighborhoods thought to be most secure; militant group Ajnad Misr claims responsibility for attack.
lead_paragraph: The blast was the latest in a long series of attacks aimed at security forces or business interests, but it appeared to be the first to hit one of the most secure parts of the capital.

headline.main: Bomb Kills Police Officer and Injures Civilians in Cairo
headline.print_headline: Elite Part of Cairo Is Bombed

snippet: The blast was the latest in a long series of attacks aimed at security forces or business interests, but it appeared to be the first to hit one of the most secure parts of the capital.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
